msg.msgText:
The values of configuration items of "LDAP" composite object can be obtained using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver show LDAP help imaserver show LDAP
EXAMPLE: imaserver show LDAP
The following configuration items are returned: Certificate Certificate to use if URL uses ssl/tls.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
